description: This file defines a custom React hook 'useTheme' that manages theme toggling (light/dark) using React's useState and useEffect hooks, persisting the theme preference in localStorage and updating the document's data-theme attribute.

methods.name: useTheme()
methods.description: Custom React hook for theme management, returning current theme, a setter, and a toggle function.

methods.name: toggleTheme
methods.description: Function to toggle the theme between 'light' and 'dark'.
